    üôà Trivia
    Hobbies

    First of all I like doing sports; therefore I play competitive basketball at BBC Gullegem. Next to that I like running and cycling. Also I enjoy spending time with my dog; both making long walks and doing some obedience training. Furthermore; gaming is a passion of mine. I can enjoy spending some hours in the virtual world. A few years back I was able to combine this hobby with another passion of mine, which is writing, at 9lives.be. Finally I like reading up and learning about tech and electronics.

    Personal

    Happily living together with my wife te be Steffi and my dog Nalu in Gullegem, Belgium

    Job preference

    Although I like talking to people, I can also enjoy programming a full day without meetings. My perfect job consists out of 60-80% coding and 20-40% analytical tasks.
